Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.utils.observe

Class MessageObservable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.utils.observe.MessageObservable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CardGrid, Controller, DevelopmentCardSpace, FaithTrack, Lorenzo, Market, Match, PersonalBoard, Strongbox, WarehouseDepots
public class MessageObservable
extends java.lang.Object
Observable class used to notify listeners registered through MessageObservable interface

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Method to add the nickname of the player that owns the observed object in the game
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player whose object is observed, if null the object is shared by all players

    • getNickname

      public java.lang.String getNickname()
      Method that return the nickname of the player that owns the observed object in the game
      Returns:
